attributes.action: Reduce university fees as a result of the Coronavirus shutting universities
attributes.additional_details: To reduce university fees, as it’s not fair or right for us students to pay for the full fee as the decision to shut universities is out of our hands. It’s unfair on us and especially 3rd year students, as getting taught face to face is more valuable than sitting behind our laptops and studying.
attributes.background: As students, we want our tuition fees reduced for the time universities being closed.
